t: Amazon launches its first Amazon Kids+ Original mobile games
s: April 14, 2022 - Amazon Kids+ is now bringing the fun of mobile gaming to its fans with the release of “Super Spy Ryan” and “Do, Re & Mi,” with more games arriving later this year.
